<p>The LMU Open Science Center received 6 applications from LMU members for the Open Science Retreat <strong>organized by <a href="../../members/individual_members/associated-members/seibold1/index.html" title="Seibold">Heidi Seibold</a></strong>, and taking place on 3. - 7. April 2023. Three members received a stipend from the OSC to work on creating/fostering an Open Science Initiative at the LMU during the retreat.</p><p>The Open Science Retreat is an event from Open Science enthusiast for Open Science enthusiasts. The main goals are:</p><ul>
<li>Learning</li>
<li>Getting stuff done</li>
<li>Networking</li>
<li>Reflecting</li>
<li>Rebooting</li>
</ul>
<p>For more information have a look at the website at <a href="https://open-science-retreat.gitlab.io">https://open-science-retreat.gitlab.io</a></p><div class="g-clear"></div>
